C4InterFlow.Cli.commandLineArgs: draw-diagrams --interfaces ..SoftwareSystems.*.Interfaces.* ..SoftwareSystems.*.Containers.*.Interfaces.* --business-processes ECommercePlatform.BusinessProcesses.* --levels-of-details context container --scopes namespace namespace-software-systems --types c4-static --aac-reader-strategy "C4InterFlow.Automation.Readers.YamlAaCReaderStrategy,C4InterFlow.Automation" --aac-input-paths "$(ProjectDir)\..\Samples\E-Commerce Platform\Yaml\Architecture" --output-dir "$(ProjectDir)\..\Samples\E-Commerce Platform\Yaml\Diagrams"
